com.appscend.media.renderers.exoPlayerRenderers

Interface ExoPlayerInterface.InternalErrorListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventLogger
    Enclosing class:
    ExoPlayerInterface

    public static interface ExoPlayerInterface.InternalErrorListener
    A listener for internal errors.

    These errors are not visible to the user, and hence this listener is provided for informational purposes only. Note however that an internal error may cause a fatal error if the player fails to recover. If this happens, ExoPlayerInterface.Listener.onError(Exception) will be invoked.
